name: Verify that the error message is shown when user leaves the password blank

children.description: Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I enter valid "jenny32@yopmail.com" and leave password field blank
And I click the 'Đăng nhập' button
Then The error messsage is shown "Mật khẩu không được để trống" next to the 'Mật khẩu' label

userStory.narrative: I want to login to the system

title: Verify that the error message is shown when user leaves the password blank

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I enter valid "<Email>" and leave password field blank
And I click the 'Đăng nhập' button
Then The error messsage is shown "Mật khẩu không được để trống" next to the 'Mật khẩu' label
